hero.title: Build Your Dream Home with Premium House Projects
hero.description: Discover our collection of meticulously designed house projects. From modern minimalist homes to classic family residences, find the perfect blueprint for your dream home. Each project comes with detailed plans, 3D visualizations, and expert guidance.

featured.title: Featured House Projects
featured.description: Explore our most popular and innovative house designs that have helped countless families build their dream homes.

products.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters to see more results.

shop.title: House Projects
shop.description: Browse our complete collection of premium house projects. Filter by style, size, and price to find the perfect design for your needs.

remembered.title: Remembered Projects
remembered.emptyDescription: Start browsing our house projects and remember the ones you're interested in to see them here.

inquiry.name: Full Name

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.empty: Your cart is empty. Start shopping to add some house projects to your cart.

about.title: About House Shop
about.subtitle: Building Dreams, One Project at a Time
about.description: We specialize in creating premium house projects that combine innovative design with practical functionality. Our mission is to help you build the home of your dreams with professional-grade plans and expert guidance.
about.missionText: To provide innovative, high-quality house projects that help people build their dream homes with confidence and style.
about.visionText: To become the leading platform for premium house designs, connecting homeowners with exceptional architectural solutions.
about.valuesText: Quality, innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction are at the heart of everything we do.

features.designTeamDesc: Our team of experienced architects and designers create innovative, functional, and beautiful house projects.
features.documentationDesc: Every project includes comprehensive plans, 3D visualizations, material lists, and construction guidelines.
features.qualityDesc: All our designs undergo rigorous quality checks to ensure they meet building codes and industry standards.
features.supportDesc: Get expert guidance throughout your construction process with our dedicated support team.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Have questions about our house projects? Need help choosing the right design? Our team is here to help you every step of the way.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.contactRequired: Please provide either an email address or phone number

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Insights, tips, and inspiration for your house building journey.

metadata.title: House Shop - Premium House Projects
metadata.description: Discover beautiful and innovative house projects. From modern designs to classic architecture, find your perfect home blueprint.
metadata.keywords: house projects, home design, architecture, house plans, construction

1.name: Modern Minimalist Villa
1.description: Contemporary 3-bedroom villa with open floor plan and sustainable features.

2.name: Classic Family Home
2.description: Traditional 4-bedroom family home with spacious kitchen and backyard.

3.name: Luxury Penthouse Design
3.description: Premium penthouse with panoramic views and high-end finishes.

4.name: Cozy Cottage
4.description: Charming 2-bedroom cottage perfect for small families or couples.

5.name: Scandinavian Style House
5.description: Clean and functional design with natural materials and plenty of light.

6.name: Contemporary Urban Home
6.description: Modern urban dwelling with smart home features and rooftop garden.
